about_the_game:
Throughout a vessel's lifetime, there are a variety of hazards the crew may experience and have to deal with. This can include treating infestations, faulty equipment and misplaced items. These contribute to unnecessary accidents and general disorder which impacts a crew's efficiency. Below is an example which contain such hazards.

This DLC adds the new 'Hazard Perception' game mode; helping to train your skills in identifying potential dangers whilst onboard a ship.

* separate hazard levels spread over the ship

* over 35 unique hazards to be found

* Multiple ways to resolve and fix each hazard

To access this DLC find the 'MISSION SELECT / DLC' button and select 'DLC'. This page is found after clicking start from the home screen.

short_description: In the Hazard Perception DLC you will need to identify and take care dealing with each scenario appropriately, whilst ensuring your ship is following modern safety standards. Be quick, however, as the inspector is on their way and you can't afford to be caught with an unseaworthy vessel.
